Text: im seeding... anybody know how to convert the avi files into iso?

@jrncraig

to covert avi into an iso image, download a program called ImgBurn. Simple to use and very effective.
imgburn isn't going to be much use unless your DVD player plays avis directly. Try avi2dvd or Nero Vision demo, as these can convert avis to dvd format.
C'mon people, AVI>ISO is easy, install ConvertXtoDVD from TPB drag and drop AVI files press burn and out comes an ISO/DVD thats ready to play.
DVDFlick is a decent and free way to make and customize your .avi into DVDs and you can make your own custom menus pretty simply and whatnot.
AM having a hard time downloading this file. It doesn't download it just stays a zero. Can anyone help? Is there another way of downloading it?
